page.title: 14The Farmer
page.content: Mr Whitwell's farm covers 2/3 of Pakenham.He bought 1000 acres in 1947 and 200 acres were added in 1965.He employs 6 men .He owns 8 average tractors and 1 large tractor for weights and he has 1 combine harvester. He grows wheat,barley,sugarbeet,peas and beans.He does not own many animals but he does have 50-60 sheep and two pigs .Peas and beans need spraying 2 times a year .Wheat ,barley and sugarbeet need spraying 5 times a year He sprays herbicide, pesticide, fungicide and dessicant. His largest field is 106 acres and the smallest field is 10 acres most fields a 30-50 acres.He said that the best thing was seeing everything in bloom and the worst thing was seeing the rain come down when he has work to do .
